overview: Reactions are mixed after three filmmakers vanish in pursuit of an obscure legend, leaving behind a video camera and a number of outstanding debts. The Glendale Ogre tells their tale in a “mockumentary” style through the eyes of family, friends, and a private investigator who learned his trade in Barbados.
tagline: Somewhere Between Legend and Burbank walks
title: The Glendale Ogre
